resources.string: Path of the file has been copied to clipboard.
The text has been copied to clipboard.
[TIP]:\nTap to stop closing and view more.

"About (%1$s) 
Need to copy file paths often? If yes, the app is developed for you. Try it! 
> How to use? Just Share/Send the target file to Path Copier. 
Notice that, icon of the app will disappear from your Launcher because it's unnecessary. 
> Source code on GitHub: https://github.com/by-syk/PathCopier 
Copyright © 2016 By_syk. All rights reserved."
